meta.title: Superintendent Update on Covid-19 and Planned Instruction - Conneaut School District

meta.content: Superintendent Update on Covid-19 and Planned Instruction

link.title: Fundraiser - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: UPDATE As per Governor Wolfe's orders due to the Coronavirus concerns, the Conneaut School District will be CLOSED for the remainder of the 2019/2020 School Year. Offices can be reached via phone and access to buildings has been restricted to essential personnel only. If you wish to contact a school building or department please call 814-683-5900 and follow the prompts for the school building or the department you wish to reach.
